English: The SLA is running like a crack addict on COPS.
Everywhere we push, they give way.
We’re already setting up a US base in Tandag — which is north\nof their capital — and from there we’re heading to Eponia.
At that point, we’ll have all of Bagango surrounded.
You might think that Torres would surrender then.
That would mean he’s a lot smarter than he’s seemed so far.
